body:
To post into postman for API testing for locations API make a GET request:

```
http://localhost:3000/locations?start=8888%20University%20Dr,%20Burnaby,%20BC&end=4700%20Kingsway,%20Burnaby,%20BC&interests=["food","gaming"]
```
- this PR will add the polylines as multiple points along the leg of the trip so a trip with a start, end, and 2 points of interest in between will generate more points than the 4 points
